attributes.review: This app is so bad. Please do not download it will hack your phone and steal everything on there. It also took forever to download. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP !!!
attributes.title: Worst app ever. DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: Omg I cannot believe this app exists. It is full of fake news. I was just trying to get on here to prove to liberals that TRUMP is actually Jesus himself and then when I clicked download it asked for my address and told me a MASK was on its way. THEN it showed me a quote by Trump that said he only ran as a republican because we would be DUMB ENOUGH to vote for him!! The audacity!! WORST APP EVER. I worshiped this man but I am done now. I will not be called stupid.
attributes.title: THIS APP MADE ME ORDER A MASK

attributes.review: I didn’t realize there was an official app for hate speech. Anyways, vote against the bigot 2020☺️💅✨
attributes.title: Absolutely Terrible App!

attributes.review: Absolutely horrible, the orange mascot the pops up when you first download the app is terrifying! Would not recommend for children.
attributes.title: A citrus golem??

attributes.review: This app was super gay🥰 and not the good kind. This app was also ✨racist✨ and there’s no good way for that. This app was 💫sexist💫 also no good kind🦋🧚🏽‍♀️✨ 0/10 wont recommend 👁👄👁
attributes.title: very ignorant✨🧚🏽‍♀️🦋🥰

attributes.review: Ever since I download this app, stale Cheetos have been flying out of my phone! Like wth!! My phone also started glitching and shutting off. I would rate it zero stars if I could. This app is just HORRIBLE! I do NOT recommend downloading it. If you like glitches, no control over your phone, AND stale freaking Cheetos... you’re gonna love this app. Thank you 🧚‍♂️✨😌

This is the worst app ever it kept trying to charge me for un reasonable things and it was the WORST APP EVER I hate this app so much please take this app down due to harassment charges for no reason and rude language
attributes.title: READ THIS 😡😡

attributes.review: This app took so long to download. I was expecting it to be fast and efficient it was not. I thought I was going to be keeping up with all things about Melania and Barron trump i don’t know who this other guys is. He’s claiming to be president? What’s that all about?? Anyways all I have to say is donald trump is a yt supremacist, FULL STOP, if you vote for him, you’re a yt supremacist FULL STOP. you tried to take away our platform, this is us taking away yours 🧚‍♀️🧚🧚‍♀️🧚‍♂️
attributes.title: Not what I was expecting...
